thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Samantha

author: Samantha
title: Samantha
text: I recently completed the Best of Vietnam and Cambodia. What a great experience. Every day was fun and interesting - just the right balance of organised activities and free time. The travel aspect was really good - great variety and all of really good quality. We did do a lot of miles but every trip was different, even the long days on a private bus were broken up with interesting stops. Our guides were exceptional, they both had excellent knowledge and absolutely took the hassle out of the trip. Their problem-solving skills were excellent, they remained upbeat and calm at all times and on top of that were a lot of fun.
